original_title: Hotel Show Colombo opens at BMICH
original_body_lines: Cargills (Ceylon) Deputy Chairman Ranjit Page (left) inaugurates the Hotel Show Colombo

The 15th edition of Hotel Show Colombo themed ‘Produce of Sri Lanka’ organised by the Sri Lanka Hospitality Graduates Association (SLHGA) together with CDS Events and the support of the Sri Lanka Tourism and private sector opened yesterday at the BMICH. It will conclude on Sunday – Pix by Upul Abayasekara
